forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle veil of cloud hovers like a soft whisper, promising a slight chance of drizzle just beyond the hour. The air is cool and still, with a hint of a west-southwest wind brushing against the skin, setting the stage for a tranquil night. Under this blanket of clouds, temperatures linger around a comfortable 58 degrees, creating an almost serene ambiance. Looking toward the horizon, one can almost feel the allure of the city’s lights glimmering through the mist, offering a cozy invitation to enjoy the soft evening charm.

By morning, expect a tantalizing glimpse of the sun as the clouds part slightly, allowing for a day that transitions from a lingering drizzle to moments of radiant brightness. The high will gently ascend to around 68 degrees, embodying a delightful warmth that will settle into the afternoon. As the wind picks up, expect a playful breeze that carries the scent of the bay, nudging one toward casual outdoor pursuits. Layered clothing will serve well today, with light sweaters being a wise choice for the morning chill, giving way to breathable fabrics as the day unfolds. Perhaps a gentle stroll through the waterfront or a leisurely coffee at a sidewalk café could best embrace the day, allowing the beauty of the city to unfold in splendid quietude.
